verses.verse: When He saw the crowds, He climbed up into the mountain. And after He was seated, His students came to Him.
And when He opened His mouth, He was teaching them, saying,
"The people who are poor in the spirit are blessed because the empire of the heavens is theirs.
The grieving people are blessed because they will be encouraged.
The submissive people are blessed because they will inherit the earth.
The people hungering and thirsting for the right way are blessed because they will be full.
The kind forgiving people are blessed because they will receive forgiving kindness.
The people who are clean in the heart are blessed because they will see God.
The peacemaking people are blessed because they will be called God's sons.
The people who have been persecuted on account of the right way are blessed because the empire of the heavens is theirs.
You are blessed when on account of Me they will insult you, persecute you, and, lying, say every evil statement against you.
Be happy and excited because your pay in the heavens is much. You see, this is how they persecuted the preachers, the ones before you.

You are the salt of the earth. But if the salt lost its flavor, what will be salted with it? It no longer has the strength for anything except to be thrown outside and to be traipsed on by the people.
You are the light of the world. A city is not able to be hid lying up on top of a mountain.
Neither are they burning a lamp and placing it under the two gallon measuring bowl, but on the lampstand, and it is shining for everyone in the house.
This is how your light must shine in front of the people in order that they might see your nice actions and admit that your Father, the One in the heavens, is magnificent.
You should not assume that I came to tear the Law or the Preachers down. I did not come to tear down, but to accomplish what they say.
You see, amen, I tell you, until the sky and the earth pass, one small letter or one hook of a letter will not in any way pass out of the Law until all things happen.

So whoever breaks one of the smallest of these demands and teaches the people that way, he will be called smallest in the empire of the heavens. But whoever will do and teach them, this person will be called huge in the empire of the heavens.
You see, I tell you that unless your right way overflows to be more right than the Old Testament transcribers' and Separatists', you will not in any way go into the empire of the heavens.
You heard that it was stated to the original people, 'You will not murder. Whoever murders will be confined at the judgment.'

I tell you that everyone who is enraged at his brother for no reason will be confined at the judgment. Whoever says to his brother, 'Stupid!' will be confined at the council. Whoever says, 'Fool!' will be confined into the Hinnom Valley of the fire.
So if you are offering up your contribution on the altar and there you remember that your brother has something against you,
leave your contribution there in front of the altar, and go back. First, settle the problem with your brother, and then when you come, offer up your contribution.

You must be having a good attitude quickly to your opponent in the court case until a certain time that you are with him on the way to court so that the opponent in the court case will not turn you over to the judge, the judge turn you over to the rower, and you will be thrown into jail.
Amen, I tell you, you will not in any way come out from there until you give back the last penny.
You heard that it was stated to the original people, 'You will not cheat on your spouse.'
I tell you that everyone looking at a woman with the intent to desire something of her, he has already cheated on his spouse with her in his heart.

If your eye, the right one, trips you up, take it out and throw it away from you. You see, it is advantageous to you that one of your body parts be ruined and your whole body not be thrown into Hinnom Valley.

And if your right hand trips you up, chop it out and throw it away from you. You see, it is advantageous to you that one of your body parts be ruined and your whole body not be thrown into Hinnom Valley.
It was stated that whoever dismisses his wife must give her a divorce.
I tell you that whoever dismisses his wife, besides and outside of a matter of sexual sin, makes her to be cheated on, and whoever marries a woman who has been dismissed is cheating.
Again you heard that it was stated to the original people, 'You will not break an oath, but you will give back your oath to the Master.'
I tell you not to guarantee at all, not with the sky because it is a throne of God,
neither with the earth because it is a footrest for His feet, neither with Jerusalem because it is a city of the great King.
Neither should you guarantee with your head because you are not able to make one hair white or black.
Your answer must be yes, yes, no, no. Whatever is much more than this is from the evil one.
You heard that it was stated, 'An eye for an eye and a tooth for a tooth.'
I tell you to not stand in opposition to the evil, but anyone who will slap you on your right cheek, also turn the other to him.
And the person who wants you to be judged and to take your long undershirt, also leave your robe to him.
And anyone who will sequester help from you for one mile, go back with him for two.
Give to the person who asks you. And you will not turn away the person who wants to get a loan with interest from you.
You heard that it was stated, 'You will love the person near you and hate your enemy.'
I tell you, love your enemies, confer prosperity on the people putting a curse on you, do nicely to the people hating you, and pray over the people harassing you and persecuting you

in order that you might become sons of your Father, the One in the heavens, because He brings His sun up on evil and good people and rains on people who do what is right and people who do what is wrong.
You see, if you love the people who love you, what pay do you have? Don't the tax collectors also do the same thing?
And if you say hello only to your brothers, what are you doing much more than others? Don't the tax collectors also do this?
So you will be complete people even as your Father, the One in the heavens, is complete."
